titles.title: HP779 O THOU who at the eucharist didst pray

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O THOU who at the eucharist didst pray
That all thy church might be forever one,
Grant us at every eucharist to say
With longing heart and soul: 'Thy will be done';
O may we all one bread, one body be,
One through this sacrament of unity.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines:
So, lord, at length when sacraments shall cease,
May we be one with all thy church above,
One with thy saints in undivided peace,
One with thy saints in one unbounded love;
More blessed still, in peace and love to be
One with the Trinity in Unity.
